hero.title: MiGreat Germany
hero.subtitle: Your trusted companion for getting a visa and moving for work
hero.description: Navigate your journey to Germany with confidence. From visa applications to degree recognition, language learning to job matching - we're here to make your dream of working in Germany a reality.
hero.testimonial.priya.name: Priya Sharma
hero.testimonial.priya.quote: In Germany, I have excellent working conditions, fair pay, and my skills are truly appreciated. The work-life balance is incredible compared to what I had in India.
hero.testimonial.akosua.name: Akosua Mensah
hero.testimonial.akosua.quote: I came to Germany through a nursing program and now work in elderly care. The salary is 12 times what I earned in Ghana, and I can send money home to help my siblings go to school.
hero.testimonial.chidinma.name: Chidinma Okafor
hero.testimonial.chidinma.quote: Germany gave me the opportunity to grow professionally. The training here is world-class, and I'm now managing a team in a 5-star hotel.
hero.testimonial.wanjiku.name: Wanjiku Kamau
hero.testimonial.wanjiku.quote: Working in Berlin's tech scene has been amazing. The innovation culture and work-life balance allow me to grow both professionally and personally.
